body: Love the story, Love the NTR, 5 stars for fapping. Recommend

Huh... So it's not that the husband's dick can't satisfy her anymore... It's just that she crave that feeling of guilt, which is why the other wife said she took it too seriously. Anyhow, aside from the blonde husband, seems like everyone found a new fetish, huh? Lol. As for the other story, eh, it's fine
Maaann this is awesome. 10/10 bro. No other words needed.
